name: Bathtub Toys
description:
Ludum dare 42 - Running out of space.

Its bath time for little Frankie. And tub time = fun time. You are on a mission to save your army buddies, while Frankie fills the tub with toys which do you harm!! Avoid them at all costs, and survive as long as you can!

A noise from Frankie is an indication of toys being flung into the bath, so watch out
